title: Keyboard-only cannot reach all controls
notes: Some task controls (e.g. delete) may not be reachable or obvious via Tab-only flows; ensure all interactive elements are in focus order and operable from keyboard.

title: No explicit confirmation after task actions
evidence: P-C notes_C L7; P-A notes_A L29; WCAG 4.1.3
notes: After add/edit/delete, users are unsure if changes saved; add visible and SR-announced status messages for task actions in both JS and no-JS flows.

title: Text too low-contrast in bright light
notes: On mobile in sunlight, small low-contrast text becomes unreadable; review colour palette and font sizes to meet contrast and legibility requirements.

title: No warning on past or invalid dates
evidence: P-C notes_C L19; P-B notes_B L30; WCAG 3.3.1
notes: Time-sensitive tasks (e.g. appointments) can be saved with past dates without clear validation; add server-side and inline error messages that identify the field and problem.

title: Filter context lost on reload
evidence: P-A notes_A L18,L29; P-B notes_B L18
notes: When filtering by module or priority, a page reload resets filters and forces users to rebuild context; persist filter state in query params or session and restore after PRG.

title: Critical tasks not visually distinguished
evidence: P-A notes_A L29; P-B notes_B L18
notes: High-risk tasks are buried among low-priority items with no clear way to mark or sort by urgency; add a critical/priority flag and default views that surface urgent tasks.

title: No reassuring daily summary view
evidence: P-C notes_C L7,L42; P-A notes_A L51
notes: Anxious users imagine 'hundreds of unknown tasks' in the list; add a simple daily summary screen showing count, done so far, and next task time to reduce uncertainty.

title: No travel mode for commuting on mobile
evidence: P-B notes_B L7,L53; P-C notes_C L42; WCAG 1.4.4; WCAG 1.4.10
notes: On bus/train with one-hand use and motion, small controls and dense layout are hard to operate; design a simplified travel mode with larger targets and good reflow.

title: Delete button text contrast 4.2:1 (fails AA)
notes: Pico.css default gray #6c757d on white = 4.2:1; needs 4.5:1

title: Focus outline too faint (Pico.css default)
evidence: Manual test: outline visible but faint

title: No confirmation for delete action
notes: Accidental clicks cause permanent deletion; add confirmation dialog

title: No undo feature for delete
notes: Defer to Semester 2; requires state management
